judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed upon the opinion of Judge Hirt.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Strauch, Appellant v. Scranton.
Argued September 24, 1945.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Alfred E. Swoyer, with him Harry A. Kolb, for appellant.

October 30, 1945:
